I understand you're sharing a rate of approximately 100/60. This could be interpreted a few ways - it might be:

- A blood pressure reading (100/60 mmHg - which would be on the lower/normal side)
- A ratio or rate for some calculation (≈1.67)
- An API rate limit (100 requests per 60 seconds)
- Something else entirely
